patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Patch Available
patch.message:
The site is running 5.40.2. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.40.3 (2021-08-23): Fix recent regressions involving scheduled SMS reminders and OAuth token renewal.
  • 5.40.4 (2021-08-26): Fix recent regressions involving data-export, line-item subtotals when using APIs+taxes, and certain scheduled reminders.
